body.p: The acquiree may have outstanding share‑based payment transactions that the acquirer does not exchange for its share‑based payment transactions. If vested, those acquiree share‑based payment transactions are part of the non‑controlling interest in the acquiree and are measured at their market‑based measure. If unvested, they are measured at their market‑based measure as if the acquisition date were the grant date in accordance with paragraphs 19 and 30.
